title: ReportStream makes it easier to send and collect public health data — for free
summary: ReportStream is an open source, cloud based platform that aggregates and delivers COVID-19 test results to health departments
description: Get faster, more accurate data directly from testing facilities, labs, and more — through a single connection.
heroImgAlt: Example screenshot of the ReportStream web application

sections.title: Why ReportStream?
sections.summary: Get faster, more accurate data directly from testing facilities, labs, and more — through a single connection.

features.title: Aggregated, clean data
features.summary: Get aggregated, validated test results from across your jurisdiction, all through a single connection.

features.title: Analytics and insights
features.summary: Get insights on reporting trends and real-time alerts that help you inform and manage your COVID-19 response.

features.title: A built-in network
features.summary: ReportStream works directly with COVID-19 test manufacturers, labs, and apps like SimpleReport to deliver more results to public health departments across the U.S.

features.title: Free and created by the CDC
features.summary: Developed for testing sites and public health departments, ReportStream is 100% free.

features.title: Safe and secure
features.summary: Test results and patient data are securely stored and protected by two-factor authentication, database encryption, and HTTPS.

sections.title: ReportStream offers two ways to deliver data directly to your public health department
sections.summary: Log in and download test results quickly through our web application, or work with ReportStream to set up a customized ELR connection.

features.title: Data download
features.summary: Get access to daily COVID-19 test results, in just a few clicks.

features.title: Industry standard data formatting
features.summary: Save time with less manual data entry. Download daily data in standard HL7 or CSV format in minutes, without setting up an ELR.

sections.title: Electronic lab reporting
sections.summary: Fast COVID-19 test results, integrated with your ELR system.

features.title: Centralize your connections
features.summary: Get data from multiple testing facilities — in less time —  through a single connection.

features.title: Customized, clean data
features.summary: ReportStream works 1:1 with public health departments to make sure data arrives in the format you need, when you need it.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.summary: For states interested in making an ELR connection with ReportStream, please check out the following resources to learn more.

freeSecure.title: Free and created by the CDC
freeSecure.summary: Developed for testing sites and public health departments, ReportStream is 100% free.

freeSecure.title: Safe and secure
freeSecure.summary: Test results and patient data are securely stored and protected by two-factor authentication, database encryption, and HTTPS.

cta.title: Interested in learning more about ReportStream?
cta.summary:
ReportStream works with public health departments looking to get better quality COVID-19 data from jurisdictions. We also collaborate with testing facilities, data aggregators , and manufacturers, and more to send test results to health departments.

Either way, if you send or analyze COVID-19 data, we’d like to help.
cta.buttonUrlSubject: ?subject=I'm interested in learning more about ReportStream
